players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Alice. Trust me on this."
Diana: "I believe Bob is the mafioso"
Bob: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. I suggest we question her."
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafioso. He has a motive to lie about Alice being the mafioso, as he might be protecting himself."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
